name: UP & DICE
description:
Atlandice has been lost to the seas!

It is up to you to take your chances and reverse fate to save your city!

UP & DICE is a puzzle game where you need to land a die in a crucible to lift the Sword of the Seas from it's shrine and bring down the water.

Help your dice on their journey by shaping the ruins of Atlandice around their path.

Up and Dice was created during the GMTK gamejam 2022, most art assets were created during the jam
